title: Gelteq
description: Gelteq specialises in the formulation, development and manufacturing of products utilising our patented, gel-based oral drug delivery system. We are dedicated to delivering products that contribute to the success of our partners, and the health of our patients.

title: Monash University
description: Monash University is a leading global institution known for its excellence in education, research, and innovation. With a diverse and inclusive community, it offers a wide range of programs and world-class facilities, fostering a culture of academic rigor and real-world impact.

title: Australian Automotive Research Centre
description: The Australian Automotive Research Centre (AARC) is a premier testing facility for automotive innovation, offering comprehensive services for vehicle development, performance testing, and engineering. Its expansive, state-of-the-art tracks and laboratories support cutting-edge research in automotive technology, safety, and durability.

title: B&A Motor Body Repairs
description: B&A Motor Body Repairs is a trusted automotive repair shop specializing in high-quality collision repairs and vehicle restorations. Known for expert craftsmanship and personalized service, they deliver reliable, efficient solutions to restore vehicles to their best condition.

title: AkzoNobel
description: AkzoNobel is a global leader in paints and coatings, renowned for innovative and sustainable solutions. With a rich heritage, they provide high-performance products that protect and enhance surfaces across industries, driving advancements in color, performance, and environmental responsibility.

title: LEAP
description: For over 25 years, LEAP has assisted thousands of companies from diverse industries to implement technology solutions to digitise their product development with solutions like AR for training, PLM, multiphysics simulation, IoT, machine learning, CAD/CAM, and documentation control.

title: Engineers Australia
description: As Australiaâ€™s national body for engineering, Engineering Australia are the voice and champion of 120,000-plus members. Providing them with the resources, connections and growth they need to do ethical, competent and high-value work in their communities.
